sourcesContent:
// src/services/mockUsers.js

const mockUsers = [
  {
    id: 0,
    username: 'stelios',
    email: 'stelios@example.com',
    password: 'a', // In a real app, passwords should be hashed
    fullName: 'Stelios Alexandrakis',
    role: 'bartender', // Possible roles: bartender, admin, customer
    bar: 'The Cocktail Lounge',
    favorites: [1, 3], // IDs of favorite cocktails
    menusCreated: 5,
    lastLogin: '10/10/2020',
    barAddress: 'Kordelio City',
    fbPage: 'www.bar.com',
    instaPage: 'www.instagram.com'
  },
  {
    id: 1,
    username: 'alkis',
    email: 'alkis@example.com',
    password: 'a', // In a real app, passwords should be hashed
    fullName: 'Alkis Tzaras',
    role: 'bartender',
    bar: 'Shaken Not Stirred',
    favorites: [2], // IDs of favorite cocktails
    menusCreated: 3,
    lastLogin: '10/10/2020',
    barAddress: 'Kordelio City',
    fbPage: 'www.bar.com',
    instaPage: 'www.instagram.com'
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    username: 'christos',
    email: 'christos@example.com',
    password: 'a',
    fullName: 'Christos Kalogridakis',
    role: 'employ',
    bar: 'The Boozy Bar',
    favorites: [1, 3, 4], // IDs of favorite cocktails
    menusCreated: 10,
    lastLogin: '10/10/2020',
    barAddress: 'Kordelio City',
    fbPage: 'https://www.remove.bg/',
    instaPage: 'www.instagram.com'
  },
];

export default mockUsers;
